homeIntroductPar1: Welcome to the BEST Pole & Sexy Fitness Studio in HCM!
homeIntroductPar2: Dan Poledance Studio is about giving all from anywhere a fun, different, and sexy way to workout. The intent of our services is to EMPOWER and create a SISTERHOOD. We offer Twerk, Pole, Chair, Stretch, and more
homeIntroductPar3: Get ready to find your SWAG. Check out our Facebook
homePolePracticeItemDescription1: Aerial Hoop is a fantastic full body workout designed to build strength, muscle tone and increase flexibility.
homePolePracticeItemDescription2: Exotic Pole focuses on seductive floor work and choreography using the lowest part of the pole
homePolePracticeItemDescription3: Aerial Yoga takes many of the traditional yoga poses and incorporates them using swings that hang from the ceiling.
homeFollowUsContactInfoAddress: Floor 2, 179B Nguyen Huu Canh Street, Ward 22
